title: Stone Soup
description: Fox is poor and hungry, but he has a clever solution to fix his problem. With the help of his many animal friends, he will make Stone Soup! Students will enjoy this classic tale with a cast of delightful characters. Detailed illustrations and high-frequency words support emergent readers.
meta: brought, feast, hungry, idea, soup, stone
Initial Sound : Discriminate initial consonant /f/ sound
Plural Nouns : Recognize and use plural nouns
Alphabetical Order : Understand and arrange words in alphabetical order

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
